meta.title: About Us - NestAi & Corbally Concepts Partnership | Proof of Concept
meta.description: Learn about our 10-year partnership between NestAi (Poland) and Corbally Concepts (Ireland) specializing in AI and Blockchain solutions. 100+ successful projects delivered.

hero.title: About Our
hero.subtitle: A decade-long partnership between two innovative companies, building the future of AI and blockchain technology.

partnership.title: 10 Years of Innovation Together
partnership.description: Our consortium brings together complementary expertise in AI engine development and user interface design. For over a decade, we've been collaborating on cutting-edge projects in Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence.

members.title: Our Consortium Members
members.subtitle: Two specialized companies working as one unified team

nestai.name: NestAI
nestai.description: Specializes in AI engine development and core technology infrastructure. Our engine team focuses on building robust, scalable AI systems that power modern applications.

corbally.name: CorballyConcepts
corbally.description: Builds user interfaces and develops proof-of-concepts that bring AI technology to life. Our design team creates intuitive experiences that make complex AI accessible.

technology.title: Our Technology Focus
technology.subtitle: For a decade, we've been at the forefront of two revolutionary technologies

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Building intelligent systems that understand, learn, and adapt. From natural language processing to machine learning algorithms, we create AI solutions that solve real-world problems.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Technology
blockchain.description: Developing decentralized solutions that ensure transparency, security, and trust. Our blockchain expertise spans from smart contracts to distributed systems architecture.

introduction.title: Proof of Concept – we create technologies that save your time, money, and nerves
introduction.subtitle: Since 2009, we've been helping companies build solutions that work from day one
story: When we started, we built tools for our own business. We made every possible mistake — wasted budgets, poorly designed features, built overly complex solutions.
Today, that experience works in your favor.
We'll guide you to avoid the same pitfalls and deliver a product that brings real results faster.

whyChooseUs.title: Why companies choose us over the cheapest contractor?

reasons.title: We tell clients what not to do — before they spend money
reasons.description: We know what wrong design and technology decisions look like. From the first conversation, we point out risks that could cost you months of work and tens of thousands. We act as a partner who looks after your interests.

reasons.title: You build faster because you work with a team that has already solved such problems
reasons.description: From B2B/B2C transport applications, through Web3 and smart contracts, to advanced AI systems — we don't experiment on your project. We come in and deliver.

reasons.title: Technology chosen for your business goal, not our preferences
reasons.description: We work with the most modern environments
reasons.conclusion: This way you get not "another app", but a tool that really works for results.

reasons.title: You get a Proof of Concept that you can immediately show to investors, clients, or the board
reasons.description: We quickly move from idea to working demo. This shortens the decision process by up to 80%. Instead of slides – you present a working product.

reasons.title: We minimize costs – maximize chances of success
reasons.description: Thanks to experience from our own projects: we don't build things that don't matter, we don't complicate architecture, we don't "burn" hours and budgets. You only pay for features that generate value.

clientBenefits.title: What do you gain as a client?

benefits.title: Certainty that the project is going in the right direction
Faster implementation of the first working version
Lower initial budget thanks to eliminating mistakes at the start
Technology tailored to business, not the other way around
A partner who thinks about risks and technical consequences for you
Product ready for presentation to investors and partners

teamExperience.title: You work with a team that has been doing this since 2009
teamExperience.description: Experience in AI, Web3, transport applications, and business systems.
teamExperience.conclusion: This is not theory. This is practice that works for you.
teamExperience.ctaTitle: Want to avoid mistakes that cost the most?
teamExperience.ctaSubtitle: Let's talk about your Proof of Concept.

cta.title: Ready to work with our consortium?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how our combined expertise can bring your AI and blockchain projects to life.
